original_title: Mrs. Brown, You've Got a Lovely Daughter
overview: A hobo (Lance Percival) goes to London with a rock group (Herman's Hermits) and their prize racing greyhound, Mrs. Brown.
tagline: You've got to sing... swing.. and do your own thing... And no one does it better in merry young London than Herman's Hermits
title: Mrs. Brown, You've Got a Lovely Daughter
